I ended up being pleasantly surprised

instrument I know
Moonstar has worked with before not

I actually think these songs are quite

nicely with some really good crescendos
and tension builds and quiet
instrumental breakdowns and there's not
really an element to moon sorrow sound
here that kind of sounds like it's the
the weakest link or like it's not doing

heavy black metal passages are

sometimes they're triumphant they're

isn't really a clutter at all some

writing songs in the style for so long
you know they're kind of one of these
bands that kind of slowly over time just

very long compositions have a strong

too
long now the production it is a little

pieces of instrumentation being worked

usually feel very live and aggressive
I think the album is very balanced for
what it is the band is able to make

sound dark like a good metal passage
